feedback: Keep front foot pointing straight down the pitch
Focus on foot alignment - it affects your entire stance
Keep head steady and over front knee throughout the shot
Work on keeping head still and centered over front leg
Maintain high front elbow for better bat control
Lift front elbow higher - it's key for shot control
Keep spine upright and avoid excessive forward lean
Reduce forward lean to improve balance and shot options
Complete the shot with full arm extension
Extend arms more in follow-through for better shot completion
